teams.name: Late Loaning Lenders
teams.loan_because:
We hate to see loans being left unfunded on 
Kiva. Although most of these loans are 
pre-funded by the Field Partners, the Field
Partners lose out on the capital if a loan
doesn't get funded on Kiva. We believe that 
this will damage the Field Partners in the long 
term and impair their capacity to make loans to new borrowers.

We can't save every red loan, but we try to
make a difference as in the Starfish Story:
http://67.199.70.191/articles/the-starfish-story.aspx
Help us fund loans we're already supporting:
http://www.kiva.org/team/late_loaning_lenders/loans?status=fundRaising


Check out Charlotte's Web: http://starfish.dynalias.org

This watchlist for loans suggested by the team members (starfish + offlist) shows:
* the current position in the popularity ranking (considering pages 1 to 5)
* the timestamp of the most recent loan
* the basket amount
Click magnifier icon for more info.  Or read Charlotte’s post at @Charlotte re: #346848
Also known as "CW," or "Charlotte's Web of Wonders"


We invite you to join us and make a difference, too. Please check the team board at 2 am Kiva time, 7 am Kiva time, 1 pm Kiva time and 6 pm Kiva time to coordinate lending.

See our team fund page:
http://www.kiva.org/lender/kivalllfund
teams.description:
Alan's account of the founding of LLL is on the  team board @Alan re: #260143. Loans that are nearing expiry won't get funded if they don't get noticed. We look for loans that are about to expire by using the Sort By:
"Expiring Soon" option instead of the default "Popularity", and then work to get them funded.

See our team FAQ, linked above (the "Team Website" button, next to our traffic light avatar).

A Team LLL glossary (contributed by team member Tony):

Red Loans: Loans that have less than five days to be funded, identifiable by the red box with the notice that says "Only x days left!" or 
"Only x hours and y minutes left!"

LLL - Late Loaning Lenders: this team, where 
lenders work together to keep loans from 
expiring.

SFDD - Starfish Daily Dozen: Under current 
practice, one of these lists is prepared and 
posted for each day, to help LLL lenders focus 
and coordinate their lending on a targeted 
group of loans (the Starfish or SF). The lists 
are prepared by a group of volunteers who 
seek to be objective in selecting the loans to 
be included in their lists. They also seek to 
spread out the loans in each list over a 24 hour 
period and to share the joy among the Field 
Partners with loans expiring during that period, 
but their efforts are always constrained by the 
choice of loans that are available for inclusion 
in the list. Loans with larger amounts needed 
will be included in the period immediately after 
each Credit Day, when lenders are feeling 
flush, but the lists will become less ambitious 
when the LLL lenders are feeling poor.

GG - Gorgeous Group: The SFDD list-makers usually add one or two of these loans at the end of the SF daily dozen lists. As the name 
implies, only group loans are picked. When it is 
first posted, a typical GG loan will expire two 
days or more after the list is posted. It will 
usually be retained as a GG until it becomes 
Fully Funded or moves into Starfish range. The amount needed when the loan is selected as a GG will vary depending on the time of month.

OPM - Abbreviation for "other people's money."  Our main lending method is to coordinate LLL team members' loans, so that we make several loans to a borrower within a short period of time. This will move the borrower's loan request up in Kiva's "popularity" sort and get the loan noticed by other people (non-members of the LLL team).  Many loans then get their funding completed by loans from those non-LLL members.  By attracting other lenders' attention to our Starfish loans in this way, we multiply the impact of our finite funds, and save more loans from expiring than we otherwise could.

RTR - Reduce the Red: These lists are 
prepared and posted when there are large 
numbers of loans slated to expire in a short 
period of time. "Red" is a reference to the red 
boxes that are added to a loan description 
when the Loan is about to expire without full 
funding.

Bulge: A short period in which a great many loans have their scheduled funding expiration times. This may happen when, for example, the volunteer coordinators at Kiva offer a promo of some kind to the editors & translators, to get them to do a lot of work in a very short period of time. Bulge loans are prime candidates for inclusion in Reduce the Red lists.

BTB - Battling the Boxes: On those days where 
there aren't 12 loans that qualify as "Starfish," the listmakers will include loans that have their red boxes, but more than 24 hours left before their deadline, to make up the 12 loans for the list. The criteria are similar to SF 
loans, i.e., one per field partner and reasonable 
amounts left to fund (not too much; not too 
little), except that these loans may have a longer time left before their expiry date. If they gain good traction on their first BTB day, they may be carried forward. If not ... they stand a second chance as SF.

FF - Fully Funded: This is LLL code for a loan 
that has received all the loans required for it to be removed from the list of loans that are raising funds 
and to move into paying back status.

Lars Ratio: the average funding per hour that is needed for a loan to become fully funded.
(Developed by team member Lars)

Wiedergänger (contributed by Maria) - German expression, literal translation "again walker," meaning "undead," i.e. a person that has died but comes back, aka a zombie. Here it means a loan that disappears from the page, but comes back again because somebody didn't check out their basket.

Ruma sana (contributed by Jouko and Potkukelkka) - Finnish expression, literal translation "ugly words."  It is a phrase to use when you are very frustrated, but want to stop just short of actual cursing -- for example, when the Kiva site repeatedly logs you out when you are trying to rescue an expiring loan at the last second.

See data about all loans currently fundraising on Kiva:
www.kivatools.com
See data about loans that have been mentioned on the LLL board, including the most recent lending activity on each loan:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/
See loans in real time, as they are made:
http://www.http://kivalive.com/index2.php

Lists are posted on the LLL Team message 
board. Join us!

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Do The Right Thing
teams.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

teams.name: Madison
teams.loan_because: We believe in the power of microloans to make a sustainable positive impact on the lives of entrepreneurs in the developing world.
teams.description: We share at least two things in common: (1) We believe in the power of Kiva to alleviate poverty and (2) we live in or have a connection to the great city of Madison, Wisconsin, USA

teams.loan_because: we want to help others.

teams.name: Michigan State University College of Law
teams.loan_because: The students and alumni of the Detroit College of Law and the MSU College of Law believe in global citizenship and providing service to those in need.
teams.description: Michigan State University College of Law continues to pursue its original purpose of providing superior professional education to qualified men and women. Moreover, it continues, through its thousands of alumni, to contribute greatly to the legal, commercial and industrial life of the wider community. Many of the most eminent lawyers, judges, public officials and business executives in Michigan are graduates of this distinguished law school as well as a growing number of practitioners throughout the United States and around the world.

teams.name: Kiva Detroit
teams.loan_because: We want to champion small businesses in Detroit!
teams.description:
Kiva Detroit is the first Kiva City, a program where Kiva works with community organizations in the United States to provide local small businesses with microloans. 

The goal of the Kiva Detroit team is to empower Detroiters to champion local small businesses through Kiva. 

To double your impact, your loan to a Kiva Detroit borrower will be matched 1-to-1 by the Knight Foundation

teams.name: Friends of WSDS in Northeast India
teams.description: This team supports the great work of WSDS-Initiate, which is an inclusive nonprofit that works with women across all tribes and minority communities in Manipur, located in the remote northeast region of India.  They have close ties with community leaders, in various tribes and regions and aligns their work with the needs of the communities, therefore going into isolated hill regions where other forms of capital are not available.   They lend to women over the age of 55, which is unusual for microlending organizations in India.   They provide clients with loans to purchase solar lamps, which is especially impactful because most of the areas WSDS works in do not have electricity. Political unrest and frequent economic blockades in the area make it very difficult to provide services, resulting in Manipur having the lowest penetration of financial services in the country.

teams.description: We are students, alumni, staff, and faculty of Rice University.

teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Unitarian Universalists
teams.loan_because:
We believe in:
**The inherent worth and dignity of every person
**Justice, equity and compassion in human relations
**Acceptance of one another and encouragement to spiritual growth in our congregations
**A free and responsible search for truth and meaning
**The right of conscience and the use of the democratic process within our congregations and in society at large
**The goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all
**Respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part.
teams.description:
We are UU congregations and individuals (including those who describe themselves as "active" or "backslid" or "interested friends" or "just looking") throughout the world. 
For more information on us, or to find a congregation near you, check out the main website for the Unitarian Universalist Association

teams.description: Founded in 1872 as a land-grant college named Virginia Agricultural and Mechanical College, Virginia Tech is now a comprehensive, innovative research university with the largest full-time student population in Virginia.  The Kiva team is made up of students, faculty, alumni, and fans of this great school!

teams.name: milepoint
teams.loan_because: As travelers we have seen poverty first hand and are committed to making the world a better place for all.
teams.description: Travelers who collect miles and points and seek free flights, hotel rooms and upgrades where possible. Here we seek to give back and invite everyone to join with us and make a difference.

teams.name: Thailand
teams.loan_because:
We are the fortunate in this world that have the ability to help the working poor rise from poverty and perhaps enjoy a bit of happiness in their lives. 

With Kiva members' help these brothers and sisters, our fellow humans, have been given a ray of hope that only they can build upon for a brighter future.
teams.description: We have a very passionate core group of members who make consistent loans.  Join us today and set Thailand as your team choice.   Let's live up to the slogan "Amazing Thailand" with our generous lending activities.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Swiss Kiva
teams.description: Residents, citizens, and fans of Switzerland with a common interest in supporting the entrepreneurs of the developing world.

teams.name: swisstweets
teams.loan_because: loaning is as easy as tweeting...
teams.description: twitters from switzerland

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Bloggers
teams.loan_because:
bloggers and their readers are generous people too. You don't have to run a blog to join the group. If you do run a blog, invite your readers/fans to join the group!

Just like blogs, our  money and support have no boundaries either.
teams.description: This group was created to bring together all types of Bloggers and their readers&fans who lend on Kiva.

teams.name: Georgia Tech
teams.loan_because: One way that we try to improve the world.
teams.description: A group of innovative and driven people

teams.name: Unitarian Universalists
teams.loan_because:
We believe in:
**The inherent worth and dignity of every person
**Justice, equity and compassion in human relations
**Acceptance of one another and encouragement to spiritual growth in our congregations
**A free and responsible search for truth and meaning
**The right of conscience and the use of the democratic process within our congregations and in society at large
**The goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all
**Respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part.
teams.description:
We are UU congregations and individuals (including those who describe themselves as "active" or "backslid" or "interested friends" or "just looking") throughout the world. 
For more information on us, or to find a congregation near you, check out the main website for the Unitarian Universalist Association

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Netherlands
teams.loan_because: het mensen helpt een zelfstandig bestaan op te bouwen.
teams.description: FairSpirit microkrediet promoot Kiva in Nederland. Doe jij ook mee met het FairSpirit team?

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: Netherlands
teams.loan_because: het mensen helpt een zelfstandig bestaan op te bouwen.
teams.description: FairSpirit microkrediet promoot Kiva in Nederland. Doe jij ook mee met het FairSpirit team?

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Jake's Bar Mitzvah Team
teams.loan_because: we are helping to tikkun olam (repair the world in Hebrew).
teams.description: My friends and family are supporting me to make the world a better place, and what better way to do that than to have funds that keep giving back so I can help through my whole lifetime.

teams.name: Wales
teams.description: For all lenders from Wales, in Wales or with a love of Wales.

teams.name: Texas
teams.loan_because: Texas does it bigger!

teams.name: US Military Servicemen and Veterans
teams.loan_because: We know that the the power of American servicemen is not only in their military prowess...but in the generosity and freedom that we personify.
teams.description: The generous warriors of today and the wise veterans of yesterday. Promoting American freedom, ideals and security through the advancement of economic growth and prosperity.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Para México
teams.loan_because:

----------

----------
Este equipo esta abierto para: 1) Cualquier persona interesada en apoyar microempresarios en México. 2) Cualquier mexicano interesado en apoyar microempresarios en todo el mundo.  3) En realidad este grupo esta abierto para todos!

teams.name: Kiva City
teams.loan_because: We support small business owners in the United States.
teams.description:
We support small businesses and want to do more to bring Kiva to cities in the U.S.

If you are interested in loaning to small business owners in the U.S. or if you want to help bring Kiva to your city, this team is a community to expand the reach of Kiva in America.

teams.loan_because: it is Kiva's 7th birthday! Let's celebrate 7 years of small change making a big difference in the world
teams.description: Melbourne lenders and friends getting together to celebrate Kiva's 7th birthday

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.name: none of the above
teams.loan_because: why not?

teams.name: SendGrid
teams.loan_because: We are fortunate to be a part of an awesome company, and love to fund hard working people in their efforts - whether it be developing a business or making the quality of life better by hard work.

teams.name: none of the above
teams.loan_because: why not?

teams.name: Third Culture Kids Everywhere
teams.loan_because: As an international culture group, we know quite intimately the reality of our global interconnectedness.  We are brothers and sisters, and we are one another’s keepers.  Some of us are in need of a loan, and some of us are able to make that loan.  Kiva.org helps us to facilitate what comes next, and that is a beautiful thing.
teams.description: A third culture kid is a person who has spent a significant part of his or her developmental years outside their parents' culture. The third culture kid builds relationships to all the cultures, while not having full ownership in any. Although elements from each culture are assimilated into the third culture kid's life experience, the sense of belonging is in relationship to others of the same background, other TCKs.

teams.name: Jens Damsgaard Vånar Memorial Fund
teams.loan_because:
Jens tragically died from Sudden infant death syndrome (SIDS), sleeping in his bed  on Thursday February 12, 2009 at the age of 13 months.
Being an innovative, dedicated and  life enthusiastic little kid, this cause is perfectly in Jens' spirit.
teams.description: The team is for anyone who knew Jens or who believes that the world will be a better place if you grasp the opportunities which arises in everyones lives.

teams.name: Pet Projects
teams.loan_because: "Man’s proper estate is an upright posture, an intransigent mind and a step that travels unlimited roads.  Productive work is the process by which man’s consciousness controls his existence, a constant process of acquiring knowledge and shaping matter to fit one’s purpose, of translating an idea into physical form, of remaking the earth in the image of one’s values. Your work is yours to choose, and the choice is as wide as your mind."

teams.name: Swiss Kiva
teams.description: Residents, citizens, and fans of Switzerland with a common interest in supporting the entrepreneurs of the developing world.

teams.name: Freedomain Radio
teams.loan_because: We want to improve relationships between people, help empower people to improve their own lives, and make the world more peaceful, rational, and empathetic.
teams.description: We are Philosophers who want to change the world by changing ourselves and the way we relate to others. We are strong advocates of the non-aggression principle and voluntarism in relationships.

teams.name: Pomona College
teams.loan_because: "They only are loyal to this college who, departing, bear their added riches in trust for mankind."
teams.description: We are students, alumni, staff, faculty, family, and friends of Pomona College in Claremont, California.

teams.name: Oxfam
teams.loan_because: We aim to increase the number of people who have a sustainable livelihood, access to social services, an effective voice in decisions, safety from conflict and disaster, and equal rights and status.
teams.description: A global movement of dedicated people working hard to fight poverty and injustice. We believe that respect for human rights will help lift people out of poverty.

teams.name: Bracken Ridge Baptist Church
teams.loan_because: we follow Jesus.
teams.description:
Bracken Ridge Baptist Church is a community of people who long to see God's kingdom come on earth as it is in heaven. We want to be a people of love so we invite people to join our family, where people are accepted and welcomed, warts and all.

We are also a people of hope who want to point people towards Jesus and the hope that he offers to this world and everyone who lives in it. If you are on a journey towards Jesus then, no matter where you start from, you are on our journey.

teams.name: Umstead Park UCC
teams.description: We, of Umstead Park United Church of Christ, with body, mind, and spirit, gather to worship, serve, and proclaim God, unknowable mystery whose center is love, and Jesus the Christ, who makes this loving mystery known.

teams.name: Entrepreneurs & Business Owners
teams.loan_because: We have a passion for seeing other people succeed and helping them to achieve total freedom and success in business.
teams.description: We are a group of entrepreneurs, business owners, and leaders who take action to change our life and the life of others.

teams.name: Capital to the Coast 2011
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference, and believe that micro-loans are a great way to empower people and reduce poverty worldwide.
teams.description: In cycling from Ottawa to Halifax, nearly 1500 km, in ten days, we want to promote the work of micro-loans, and encourage and inspire people to lend through Kiva, and make a sustainable and measurable difference.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Kiva Washington, DC
teams.loan_because: The international community in DC believes and understands the importance of assisting people around the world to achieve their dreams and freedoms.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Geoffrey's Malibu
teams.loan_because: We strive to offer a helping hand.  We want to support people around the world as they establish better lives for themselves and their families.
teams.description: Geoffrey's Malibu is a fine dining restaurant on the West Coast.  We choose to give to our local community and with Kiva, our global community.

teams.name: Pepperdine MBA
teams.loan_because: We are MBA students (faculty, alumni, and friends or family) exhibiting values centered leadership by advancing responsible business and life practices.  This project reminds us how we can produce positive change in the world.
teams.description: Students, Faculty, Staff, Alumni, and Friends and Family of Pepperdine University

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.name: Colbert Nation
teams.loan_because: I am helping my fellow wealthy American friends lighten their swollen pockets to help the rest of the world prosper.
teams.description: Stephen Colbert is the host and executive producer of the Emmy-nominated series on Comedy Central, "The Colbert Report." Touted by the New York Times as "one of the best television shows of the year" and praised as "a must-watch show" by Entertainment Weekly, "The Colbert Report" has garnered ratings and critical success as one of the top shows on television.

teams.name: Child Education
teams.loan_because: We want to provide children the opportunity for an education to help them break out of the cycle of poverty.  And because we appreciate how fortunate we have been to receive an education which has helped us get where we are today
teams.description: Join if you would like to pool resources to make loans/donations that improve education opportunities for children in developing nations

teams.name: Christians4Kiva
teams.loan_because:
The primary reason under developed nations suffer is a lack of capital goods, resources, and education. These are all factors that can be countered with microlending.

Remember what we do doesnt have to be grand (large) to be great.
teams.description:
Team Eco! (Team Economics)

Team Eco's focus is on the worst of the worst and making the our splash as large as possible. Together we can ripple through.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: The Conservative Party Kiva Group
teams.loan_because: We are members of the Conservative Party in the UK who believe that helping citizens of poorer countries to create wealth is the best way to take people out of poverty.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.

teams.name: Vermont... Jeezum Crow!
teams.loan_because: From the Green Mountains to the rest of the globe, we all benefit when collectively we can contribute to improve the lives of others.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Team Google Certified Teachers
teams.loan_because: we want to give back in some small way.
teams.description: We are a team of Google Certified Teachers and their Google loving friends who thought perhaps we can make a difference in some small way.

teams.name: Cincinnati
teams.loan_because: Cincinnati is a great town with great individuals. Just wanted to provide another means to show that to the world.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: London
teams.loan_because:
Looking for Team members who want to become more involved in promoting the team and expanding our membership. Contact Richard to join the leadership. 

If each team member posted a link to this team on their favourite social media site we should see a spike in membership.. 520 as at 15th March 2013

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: Dune Guy Day Every Day
teams.loan_because: We want to embrace the spirit of giving all year long.
teams.description: We are family and friends who give each other gifts on a made up holiday called "Dune Guy Day."

teams.name: Cheeseheads For Change
teams.loan_because: If you give a man a fish, you feed him for a day.  Now in the modern world, you can give that same man a loan to buy a fishing pole, he catches fish with his new pole to feed his family, his community improves because of his financial success, he pays the loan back, and  you can re-loan that money again to help someone else buy a fishing pole . . . wait, that sounds like a conspiracy by the Rapala Corporation to sell more fishing equipment, what are we supporting here ;-)
teams.description: Our Kiva lending team is a non-political group consisting of Green Bay Packers fans lovingly known as Cheeseheads, and anyone who lives in or has ties to the great state of Wisconsin and is interested in making the world a better place.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Washington State
teams.loan_because: Each of us has a responsibility to all of us.

teams.name: Mississauga Kids
teams.loan_because: As business owners and parents in Mississauga we know the children of Mississauga have a wealth of opportunities available to them.  We hope that this group will help to provide opportunities to businesses, parents and of course children in less fortunate parts of our world.
teams.description: Mississauga, Ontario is a city of about 700,000 people just to the west of Toronto.  Our city is fortunate to have wonderful community centres, parks and schools.  There are people living in Mississauga from all over the globe.  We are generous in small and large ways.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Grateful in Marin
teams.loan_because: We are incredibly grateful for all the blessings that have been bestowed on us, including the opportunity to live in the shadow of beautiful Mount Tamalpais.
teams.description: Anyone who has ever been to Marin or had the opportunity to live here....or anyone who is simply grateful for what they have.

teams.name: University of Minnesota- Twin Cities
teams.description: Students, Staff, Faculty and Alumni from the University of Minnesota- Twin Cities

teams.name: North Yarmouth Academy
teams.loan_because: we are bleeding-heart capitalists.
teams.description: We are current students, alumni, faculty, and other members of the NYA community.

teams.name: Peter & Betsy's Wedding
teams.loan_because: As we begin our life together, we hope our friends and family will join our Kiva Team.
teams.description: Our friends and family who have joined us to celebrate our wedding by lending through Kiva.

teams.name: The University of Texas at Austin
teams.loan_because: What starts here changes the world.
teams.description: Students, alumni, faculty, and staff of UT who lend on Kiva.

teams.name: University of California Berkeley Alumni
teams.loan_because: We believe in the inherent dignity of all persons regardless of circumstance and want to extend a helping hand to others less fortunate.
teams.description: We welcome everyone worldwide who has attended UC Berkeley or who is a friend of the university.  Help us make a difference!  Go Bears!

teams.name: Team California
teams.loan_because: Our state rules and we care about the world around us!
teams.description: We are from the great state of California!
